entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to 9 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
